text: Francisco Javier Flores Chávez (born 19 February 1966) is a Mexican politician from the National Action Party. From 2000 to 2003 he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Jalisco. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Jalisco Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:National Action Party (Mexico) politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians
title: Francisco Javier Flores Chávez
